title: WAMC News Podcast - Episode 336
dc:creator: WAMC Northeast Public Radio
description: As leaf-peeping season arrives, we get a fall preview from Taryn Bauerle, associate professor of plant science at Cornell University in Ithaca, and Vermont Commissioner of the Department of Forest, Parks and Recreation Michael Snyder, also the state forester.
itunes:subtitle: As leaf-peeping season arrives, we get a fall preview from Taryn Bauerle, associate professor of plant science at Cornell University in Ithaca, and Vermont Commissioner of the Department of Forest, Parks and Recreation Michael Snyder, also the state forester.
